attributes.action: consider reducing the number of Managers and Administrators in the Public Services (NHS, Government, Local Government etc.)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every 2 to 3 years the government re-organises our public services, each time more administrators and managers are employed. We are now top heavy again and we urge the government to redress the balance.  This will save huge amounts of public money which can be better used in providing better services.
